meanings.definition: A person engaged in a specified activity as one's main paid occupation rather than as a pastime.
meanings.sent1: The professionals at the hospital work hard to help sick people.
meanings.sent2: I trust the professionals to fix my car because they are skilled mechanics.
meanings.sent3: The professionals at the bakery take their job seriously, even when making funny-shaped cakes.
meanings.sent4: She is a professional at solving puzzles, always finding the missing piece effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The professionals in the movie industry make magic on the screen with their acting skills.
